#BTT+AIThe integration of #BTT with AI computing represents a significant forthcoming breakthrough in the blockchain industry. #BitTorrent, with its billion-strong global user base and highly distributed network of nodes, stands at the forefront of this revolution.

The BTT and AI computing integration offers an alternative by distributing the computational load across BitTorrent's global network of nodes. This approach not only democratizes access to AI technology by lowering operational costs but also aligns with the core principles of…

AI technologies, particularly those involving machine learning and deep learning, require substantial computational power for data processing and model training. Traditionally, this demand has necessitated reliance on centralized cloud computing services, which not only incurs…
This synergy not only ensures the computational power necessary for AI technologies but also enhances decentralized support, marking a pivotal moment for the future of blockchain technology.
These nodes can earn BTT through computational tasks, aiding AI in achieving content delivery networks (CDN), distributed computing, and other requirements.

团队持有的HT已经全部销毁，HT正式成为了一个没有实际控制人的meme代币，所有剩余的HT都是市场上的流通代币。
在接下来的几周内，将继续销毁1000万至1500万HT，价值2000万至3000万美元。这轮销毁之后，HT的总量将仅剩9500万枚。在过去的一个月里，已累计销毁了8664万枚HT，包括团队持有及市场中用户兑换的HTX，总价值达到2.6亿美元。
The HT held by the team has been completely burned and #HT has officially become a meme coin without any actual controllers, with all remaining HT being market circulation tokens.

In the coming weeks, 10 to 15 million HT will continue to be burned, valued at $30 million. Only 95 million HT will remain. Over the past month, a total of 86.64 million HT has been burned, including HT held by teams and the users exchanged for HTX, valued at $260 million USD.
